member.name: M:ArduinoThermoHygrometer.Api.Controllers.BatteryController.GetByIdAsync(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves a battery object by its id.
member.param: The id of the battery object to retrieve.
member.response: Returns Battery object.
Returns NotFound if invalid id or the battery object is not found.

member.summary: Retrieves a battery object by its registration timestamp.

member.response: Returns Battery object.
Returns NotFound if invalid timestamp or the battery object is not found.

member.summary: Retrieves a list of battery objects by its date.

member.response: Returns a list of Battery objects.
Returns NotFound if invalid date or list of battery objects is empty.
